page.title: 11FUN RUN
page.content:
Faifley Fun run took place on Saturday June 15th at 2pm at the Community Centre in Milldam Road.
Anyone could enter and register on the day.The fee was 50p for employed people and 25p for the unemployed.Refreshments from the tea bar were available afterwards.
The Fun Run is a four mile course round Faifley organised by the community education centre to help raise funds.All competitors were given a certificate and the top fifty were given medals.Despite the terrible weather everyone who took part enjoyed themselves thoroughly.
